mapper.insert: INSERT ALL WHEN 1=1 THEN INTO NOTICE_BOARD VALUES( NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{nTitle}, #{nWriter}, #{nContent}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, DEFAULT ) WHEN #{renameFileName} IS NOT NULL THEN INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES( ATTACHMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'NCODE', NOTICE_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{originalFileName}, #{renameFileName} ) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NB.NID,NB.BCODE,NB.NTITLE,NB.NWRITER,NB.NCONTENT,NB.NCOUNT,NB.NCREATEDATE, NB.NMODIFYDATE,NB.NSTATUS,A.ORIGINALFILENAME,A.RENAMEFILENAME FROM NOTICE_BOARD NB LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (NB.BCODE = A.BCODE AND NB.NID = A.REFBID) WHERE NB.NSTATUS ='Y' ORDER BY NID DESC
SELECT NB.*, A.ORIGINALFILENAME, A.RENAMEFILENAME FROM NOTICE_BOARD NB LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (NB.BCODE = A.BCODE AND NB.NID = A.REFBID) WHERE NID = #{nId} AND NSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NSTATUS = 'Y'
and ntitle like '%' || #{stitle} || '%'
and ncontent like '%' || #{scontent} || '%'
order by nid desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NSTATUS='Y'
and ntitle like '%' || #{stitle} || '%'
and ncontent like '%' || #{scontent} || '%'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BCODE = 'NCODE' AND REFBID = #{nId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGINALFILENAME = #{originalFileName}, RENAMEFILENAME = #{renameFileName} WHERE BCODE = 'NCODE' AND REFBID = #{nId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES ( REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'NCODE', #{rContent}, #{refBid}, #{rWriter}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPLY WHERE REFBID = #{ refBid } AND RSTATUS ='Y' AND BCODE ='NCODE' ORDER BY RID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET RSTATUS ='N', rModifyDate = SYSDATE WHERE BCODE ='NCODE' AND RID = #{ rId }
